name: Lilo & Stitch: Trouble in Paradise
description: Disney's Lilo & Stitch: Trouble in Paradise (titled simply Disney's Lilo & Stitch for the American PlayStation release) is a 2002 action-platform video game developed by Blitz Games for PlayStation and Microsoft Windows. The game is a tie-in to and based on the Walt Disney Feature Animation film, Lilo & Stitch. The PlayStation version was published by Sony Computer Entertainment, while the Windows version was published by Disney Interactive Studios.
